buy the ingredients for these recipes or not. You then put the right people 
on the job that best fits their stats and the beer making process begins. 
At this point you can tap mice that scurry across the floyof your brewery 
while your employees do everything automatically or you can do market 
research to see what types of beers potential customers are in to. You can 
upgrade your equipment to improve the quality and quantity of your product. 
The currency does not make a whole lot of sense from an American 
perspective. If you've ever wanted to do logistical work for a brewery, 
this is the game for you. If you ever wanted to own a brewery for the 
freedom of creative process, this game will not scratch that itch. Not 
recommended.

content: Before I start complaining, I really do like this game. BUT... there's a single menu button that expands into a dozen more menu buttons. Some of them expand into even more options.
